revised_title: Microscopical Observations on the Brain and Nerves: The Discovery of Valves in the Vas Breve and the Structure of the Spleen
tldr: The author examines the structure and composition of the brain and nerves, discovering that they are made up of delicate fibers and globules connected by a gelatinous substance. The author also investigates the structure of the spleen and the presence of valves in the vas breve, providing insights into the functions of these organs.
